updates.content:
We got reports of errors `genericError.MISSING_FIELDS` when trying to save an item that contains link or assets fields inside modular blocks.

We deployed a fix and we are monitoring right now.

This does not effect the CMA, only the admin interface.
No more reports about this error so far. We are closing this.

name: Cannot save items that contain some kind of fields in modular blocks (`genericError.MISSING_FIELDS`)
